About Skills Projects

Hello! I'm Anna Harrington.

I'm a web developer based in New York City. I combine my love of coding and my background in consumer research to create fun and intuitive user experiences.

I enjoy work that is . . .

Technical

Creative

Strategic

Collaborative

I came to web development from a career in market research consulting, which included the UX research that initially sparked my interest in code. From my previous work, I bring with me extensive experience in project management and team collaboration, an eye for usability, and a sensitivity to broader business objectives.

To accelerate my learning in programming, I recently attended the Recurse Center, a three-month self-directed retreat in New York City which brings programmers together for knowledge sharing, pair programming, technical talks, and social events.

TimeTiles Web App

Technologies:

JavaScript, React, Redux, Node, MongoDB

TimeTiles is a way to log your activities and time spent toward different goals, and then view at a glance what you've been up to. Tiles lighten or darken in color according to how recently you've worked toward a goal and the total time you've spent.

Try it

Email: test@email.com

Password: tiles

Front End API

Design Portfolio Website

Visit the site View code

Technologies:

JavaScript, HTML, CSS

Lauren is a design strategist who was seeking a simple, modern, and responsive site to showcase her work for those interested in contacting her for teaching and conference speaking engagements.

Anna was an absolute pleasure to work with - highly responsive, collaborative, and thoughtful. She asked all the right questions and helped me articulate what I wanted out of a portfolio website in a way that other collaborators haven't.

In a very short amount of time, she created a lovely, simple portfolio for me from scratch - exactly what I was looking for. I'm impressed by her work and the way she made this project so easy and seamless.

Lauren Wong
